channel.title: 工具 on DEVIN's BLOG
channel.description: Recent content in 工具 on DEVIN's BLOG

item.title: Terminal快捷键
item.description: 命令行快速移动光标 Ctrl+A/E 行首/行末 Alt+F/B 按单词前后移动 Alt . 上条命令行的最后一个参数 Ctrl+W/K 删除光标前后的内容

item.title: 配置github pages教程
item.description: 1.基础配置 关于删除submodule: Git submodule add: “a git directory is found locally” issue - Stack Overflow mkdir myblog && cd myblog hugo new site . git init git submodule add git@github.com:MeiK2333/github-style.git themes/github-style vim .gitignore git add . git push -u origin master 更新主题 github-style theme cd themes/github-style git pull 编辑readme hugo new readme.md echo '`Hello World!`' > content/readme.md 2.新增帖子 Hugo will create a post with draft: true, change it to false in order for it to show in the website.
